title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister of State at the Department of Transport) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department transport) order 2023

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Shane Smyth, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Shane Smyth, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Transport, is appointed as Special Adviser to Jack 
Chambers, Minister of State at the Department of Transport with effect from 
17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

7 February, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 10th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [54] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
